We’re taking part in the
Voilah! Festival
15 April - 31 May 2016
Discover your inner French by immersing yourself in enthralling performing arts, relishing in the very best of French gastronomy, all the while sipping the finest of champagnes. Voilah! 2016 presents a multi-sensory festival experience not to be missed.
► Explore Voilah! <[[http://voilah.sg/]]>
We’re the official champagne for the National Gallery Singapore We’ve been named National Gallery Singapore’s official champagne. The Gallery's first international exhibition, Reframing Modernism, offers a new alternative to the existing paradigm of how modernist painting is understood. Click here to book tickets and for more information. ► Book Here <[[https://www.nationalgallery.sg/see-do/programme-detail/149/reframing-modernism]]>
